achievements.description: In the Election Day job, complete the heist in stealth and swing the votes to the republican favor.

achievements.description: On day 2 of the Election Day job, steal all of the extra loot in the storage bins.

achievements.name: bob_5
achievements.description: On day 1 of the Election Day job, tag the right truck.

achievements.name: bob_6
achievements.description: On day 1 of the Election Day job, tag the wrong truck, then find nothing in the vault.

achievements.name: bob_7

achievements.name: bob_8

achievements.name: gmod_1
achievements.description: Collect 5 packages with the green mantis stamp on to earn a green crate.

achievements.name: gmod_2
achievements.description: Collect 10 packages with the yellow bull stamp to earn a yellow crate.

achievements.name: gmod_3
achievements.description: Collect 15 packages with the red spider stamp on to earn a red crate.

achievements.name: gmod_4
achievements.description: Collect 20 packages with the blue eagle stamp on to earn a blue crate.

achievements.name: gmod_5
achievements.description: Collect 25 packages with the purple snake stamp to earn a purple crate.

achievements.name: gmod_6
achievements.description: Earn one of each crate.

achievements.name: gmod_7
achievements.description: Modify the CAR-4 rifle with a Competition Foregrip, CAR Quadstacked Mag, and a Competitor's Compensator.

achievements.name: gmod_8
achievements.description: Modify any pistol with a Pistol Red Dot Sight and a Flash Hider.

achievements.name: gmod_9
achievements.description: Modify the CAR-4 rifle with a Gazelle Rail, Tactical Compensator, Compact Holosight, Wide Stock and a Military Laser Module.

achievements.name: gmod_10
achievements.description: Modify any AK rifle with a Lightweight Rail, AK Slavic Dragon Barrel, AK Quadstacked Mag, and a Funnel of Fun Nozzle.

achievements.name: gage3_1
achievements.displayName: Build Me an Army Worthy of Crime.net
achievements.description: Equip the Golden AK.762 rifle. Celebrating 500,000 heisters in the official community group, you can now unlock the Golden AK.762 rifle by simply joining the PAYDAY 2 Official Group on Steam.

achievements.name: gage3_2
achievements.displayName: The Man With the Golden Gun
achievements.description: Kill 6 Skulldozers using only the golden AK.762 rifle.

achievements.name: gage3_3
achievements.description: Perform 50 headshot kills using any sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Asilidae" mask, "Carapace" material and "Bugger" pattern.

achievements.name: gage3_4
achievements.description: Perform 100 headshot kills using any sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Tarantula" mask, "Insectoid" material and "Spider Eyes" pattern.

achievements.name: gage3_5
achievements.description: Perform 250 headshot kills using any sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Vespula" mask, "Bug Shell" material and "Venomous" pattern.

achievements.name: gage3_6
achievements.description: Perform 500 headshot kills using any sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Sphodromantis" mask, "Hard Shell" material and "Wings of Death" pattern.

achievements.name: gage3_7
achievements.description: Kill 25 enemies from 40 meters using only the Thanatos .50 cal sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Tank Buster" Barrel for the Thanatos .50 cal sniper rifle.

achievements.name: gage3_8
achievements.description: Perform a headshot kill on enemies using only the R93 sniper rifle while zip lining. Unlocks the "Compensated Suppressor" for the R93 sniper rifle.

achievements.name: gage3_9
achievements.description: Kill 3 enemies with one bullet using any sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Angled sight" for all sniper rifles.

achievements.name: gage3_10
achievements.description: Kill 10 Shields by shooting through their shields using only the R93 sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Short Barrel" for the R93 sniper rifle.

achievements.name: gage3_11
achievements.description: Perform 10 headshot kills on Cloakers using only the Thanatos .50 cal sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Suppressed Barrel" for the Thanatos .50 cal sniper rifle.

achievements.name: gage3_12
achievements.description: Kill 10 Bulldozers using only the Thanatos .50 cal sniper rifle. Unlocks the "CQB Barrel" for the Thanatos .50 cal sniper rifle.

achievements.name: gage3_13
achievements.displayName: Didn't See That Coming Did You?
achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies using any sniper rifle while zip lining. Unlocks the "Theia Magnified Scope" for sniper rifles.

achievements.name: gage3_14
achievements.description: Kill 25 Snipers using only the Rattlesnake sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Tactical Aluminium Body" for the Rattlesnake sniper rifle.

achievements.name: gage3_15
achievements.description: Kill 25 enemies shooting through walls or objects using only the R93 sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Wooden Body" for the R93 sniper rifle.

achievements.name: gage3_16
achievements.description: Kill 2 enemies with one bullet 25 times using only the Rattlesnake sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Sniper Suppressor" for the Rattlesnake sniper rifle.

achievements.name: gage3_17
achievements.description: Kill 250 enemies using only the Rattlesnake sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Long Barrel" for the Rattlesnake sniper rifle.

achievements.name: kosugi_1
achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, secure 4 bags of loot.

achievements.name: kosugi_2
achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, secure at least 6 bags of loot and escape without killing anyone.

achievements.name: kosugi_3
achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, secure a piece of every available type of loot, including money, gold, cocaine, artifact, painting, weapons and server.

achievements.name: kosugi_4
achievements.displayName: I Will Walk Faceless Among Men
achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, secure all 4 pieces of the samurai armor. Unlocks the "Somen Mempo" mask.

achievements.name: kosugi_5
achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, secure 16 bags of random loot including all 4 pieces of the samurai armor.

achievements.name: kosugi_6
achievements.displayName: I Will Die and Die, and Die Again
achievements.description: Complete the Shadow Raid job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: bigbank_1
achievements.description: In The Big Bank job, hack the correct computer on the first try. Unlocks "The First American" mask, the "Parchment" material, the "Roman" pattern and the "Tactical Grip" for the Falcon rifle.

achievements.name: bigbank_2
achievements.displayName: It Takes a Pig to Kill a Pig
achievements.description: Drop Floyd the pig on top of a law enforcer. Unlocks "The 1st" mask, the "Exhausted" material, the "Ruler" pattern and the "Extended Magazine" for the Falcon rifle.

achievements.name: bigbank_3
achievements.description: Complete The Big Bank job with 16 secured bags. Unlocks "The 16th" mask, the "Clay" material, the "Spartan" pattern and the "Marksman Foregrip" for the Falcon rifle.

achievements.name: bigbank_4
achievements.description: In the Big Bank job, complete the heist in under 12 minutes on the Hard difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Wooden Foregrip" for the Falcon rifle.

achievements.name: bigbank_5
achievements.description: In the Big Bank job, complete the heist without triggering the alarm. Unlocks the "CQB Stock" for the Falcon rifle.

achievements.name: bigbank_6
achievements.description: Bring Bobblehead Bob to the vault. Unlocks "The 18th" mask, the "Gemstone" material, the "God of War" pattern and the "Wooden Stock" for the Falcon rifle.

achievements.name: bigbank_7
achievements.description: In the Big Bank job, complete the heist with 12 bags in the default escape with all the lasers active. Unlocks the "CQB Foregrip" for the Falcon rifle.

achievements.name: bigbank_8
achievements.description: In the Big Bank job, start the Big Bank job after having spent all 10 favors in Preplanning. Unlocks the "Retro Foregrip" for the Falcon rifle.

achievements.name: bigbank_9
achievements.description: Complete The Big Bank job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: bigbank_10
achievements.description: Complete any heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different "Big Bank" mask each. Unlocks the "Marksman Stock" for the Falcon rifle.

achievements.name: gage4_1
achievements.description: Beat a Shield to death using the Telescopic Baton.

achievements.name: gage4_2
achievements.description: Own the Locomotive, Street Sweeper, Reinfeld, Mosconi, Izhma, Raven and M1014 Shotguns. Unlocks the "Flip-up Sight" for the Raven shotgun.

achievements.name: gage4_3
achievements.description: Complete any single day of a heist, killing at least 50 enemies using only your melee weapon.

achievements.name: gage4_4
achievements.description: Get 7 enemy headshot kills within 11 seconds using any shotgun. Unlocks the "Short Barrel" for the M1014 shotgun, "John" mask, "Explosive" material and "Terror" pattern.

achievements.name: gage4_5
achievements.description: Complete any heist by killing at least 50 enemies and getting 101% accuracy or above using any shotgun. Unlocks the "Long Barrel" for the M1014 shotgun.

achievements.name: gage4_6
achievements.description: Kill 50 Shields using any shotgun and slug ammo. Unlocks the "Collapsed Stock" for the M1014 shotgun.

achievements.name: gage4_7
achievements.description: On the Nightclub job, kill 25 law enforcers using your shovel. Unlocks the "Short Barrel" for the Raven shotgun.

achievements.name: gage4_8
achievements.description: Kill 10 snipers using any shotgun and flechette ammo. Unlocks the "Long Barrel" for the Raven shotgun, "Clint" mask, "Leaf" material and "Monkey Skull" pattern.

achievements.name: gage4_9
achievements.description: Hit 4 enemies simultaneously using any shotgun and HE rounds. Unlocks the "Solid Stock" for the M1014 shotgun.

achievements.name: gage4_10
achievements.description: Kill 10 Bulldozers using any shotgun and 000 buckshot ammo. Unlocks the "Long Barrel" for the Street Sweeper shotgun, "Steven" mask, "Sparks" material and "Chief" pattern.

achievements.name: gage4_11
achievements.description: Complete any day of a heist in stealth with a Locomotive 12G shotgun modified with the "Silent Killer Suppressor" equipped. Unlocks the "Suppressed Barrel" for the Street Sweeper shotgun, "Rutger" mask, "Banana Peel" material and "Banana" pattern.

achievements.name: gage4_12
achievements.description: In the Rats job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different "Shotgun Pack" mask each on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

achievements.name: gage5_1
achievements.description: Kill 25 Bulldozers using the Gewehr 3 Rifle. Unlocks the "Sniper Barrel" for the Clarion rifle, "Sniper Stock", "Sniper Grip" and "Sniper Foregrip" for the Gecko 7.62 rifle, "Precision Stock", "Precision Foregrip", "Precision Grip" and the "DMR Kit" for the Gewehr 3 rifle as well as the "Black Death" mask.

achievements.name: gage5_2
achievements.description: Kill at least four enemies with one GL40 grenade launcher shot. Unlocks the "Sawed-off" Stock for the GL40 grenade launcher and the "Crow Goblin" mask.

achievements.name: gage5_3
achievements.description: Equip the GL40 grenade launcher, the Locomotive 12G shotgun, and the Improved Combined Tactical Vest. Unlocks the "CQB Foregrip" and "Plastic Stock" for the Gecko 7.62 rifle.

achievements.name: gage5_4
achievements.description: Own one of every Gage Assault Pack weapon in the game. Unlocks the "Short Barrel" for the Clarion rifle, "Light Stock" for the Gecko 7.62 rifle, "Plastic Foregrip" and "Assault Kit" for the Gewehr 3 rifle, "Evil" material and "Vicious" pattern.

achievements.name: gage5_5
achievements.description: Kill 25 enemies at 40 meters or more using only the GL40 grenade launcher. Unlocks the "Wooden Stock" for the Gecko 7.62 rifle, "Pirate Barrel" for the GL40 grenade launcher, "Bone" material and "Muerte" pattern.

achievements.name: gage5_6
achievements.description: In the Watchdogs job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different Assault Pack mask each on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Light Foregrip" for the Gecko 7.62 rifle, "Tactical Foregrip" for the Gewehr 3 rifle, "Long Barrel" for the Clarion rifle, "Void" material and "Death" pattern.

achievements.name: gage5_7
achievements.description: Kill a jumping Cloaker using the GL40 grenade launcher. Unlocks the "Wooden Stock", "Retro Grip" and "Wooden Foregrip" for the Gewehr 3 rifle.

achievements.name: gage5_8
achievements.description: Kill 25 thugs using the Ding Dong breaching tool melee weapon. Unlocks the "Frost" material and "Emperor" pattern.

achievements.name: gage5_9
achievements.description: Kill 10 Cloakers using the Gecko 7.62 rifle. Unlocks the "Skeletal Stock", "Fabulous Stock" and "Fabulous Foregrip" for the Gecko 7.62 rifle as well as the "Volt" mask.

achievements.name: gage5_10
achievements.description: Kill 200 enemies using the Clarion rifle. Unlocks the "Suppressed Barrel" and "G2 Grip" for the Clarion rifle as well as the "Professor Wrath" mask.

achievements.name: pig_1
achievements.description: Complete the Hotline Miami job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: pig_2
achievements.description: In day 2 of the Hotline Miami job, reach the Commissar's apartment in under 210 seconds on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Rasmus" mask, "Tactical Foregrip" and the "Ergonomic Stock" for the Uzi submachine gun, "Chromescape" material and "Palmtrees" pattern.

achievements.name: pig_3
achievements.displayName: Do You Like Hurting Other People?
achievements.description: In the Hotline Miami job, kill 30 thugs with the Baseball Bat. Unlocks the "Dennis" mask, "Solid Stock" for the Uzi submachine gun, "Wooden Grip" for the Cobra submachine gun, "Rubber" material and "Hip to Be Polygon" pattern.

achievements.name: pig_4
achievements.description: Cook and secure six bags of meth on day 1 of the Hotline Miami job. Unlocks the "Graham" mask, "Ghetto Blaster", "Extended Mag" and "Just Bend It" for the Blaster 9mm submachine gun, "Error" material and "Be Somebody" pattern.

achievements.name: pig_5
achievements.description: In the Hotline Miami job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different Hotline Miami mask each on the Hard difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Silent Death" and "Folded Stock" for the Uzi submachine gun, "Suppressor" and "No Stock" for the Cobra submachine gun and "Short Barrel" for the Blaster 9mm submachine gun.

achievements.name: pig_7
achievements.description: On day 2 of the Hotline Miami job, save someone in need. Unlocks the "Aubrey" mask, "Ergo Grip", "Extended Mag" and "Unfolded Stock" for the Cobra submachine gun, "Sunset" material and "Doodles" pattern.

achievements.name: squek
achievements.description: Complete the Art Gallery job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: bulldog_1
achievements.displayName: Why Don't We Just Use a Spoon?
achievements.description: Complete the Hoxton Breakout job on the Normal difficulty or above. Unlocks "Hoxton" as a playable character and the "Nova's Shank" melee weapon.

achievements.name: bulldog_2
achievements.description: Complete the Hoxton Breakout job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: bulldog_4
achievements.description: Hurt an enemy using the Nova's Shank melee weapon.

achievements.name: halloween_nightmare_5
achievements.description: Complete the Safe House Nightmare job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: eagle_1
achievements.description: Kill 25 enemies as they rappel using the Nagant sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Constable" mask, the "Silenced Barrel" and the "Long Barrel" for the Nagant sniper rifle, "Gunsmoke" material and "Dazzle" pattern.

achievements.name: eagle_2
achievements.description: Kill 25 enemies while in stealth using the Trench knife. Unlocks the "Red Bear" mask, "Short Barrel", "Suppressed Barrel", "Short Mag", "Folded Stock", "No Stock", "Solid Stock", "Heatsinked Suppressed Barrel" for the Patchett L2A1 submachine gun," Barrel Sight 44", "Damper.L 44 Nozzle" for the Broomstick pistol, "Red Sun" material and "Death Dealer" pattern.

achievements.name: eagle_3
achievements.description: In the Hoxton Breakout job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different "Historical" mask each on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Discreet Stock" and "Short Barrel" for the Nagant sniper rifle, "Precision Barrel" for the Broomstick pistol, "Extended Mag" and "Long Barrel" for the Patchett L2A1 submachine gun and the "Heatsinked Suppressed Barrel" for the Buzzsaw 42 light machine gun.

achievements.name: eagle_4
achievements.description: Equip a Broomstick pistol with the Damper.L 44 Nozzle and the Barrel Sight 44. Unlocks the "British Bulldog" mask, "High Capacity Mag" and "Holster Stock" for the Broomstick pistol, "Army Green" material and "Filthy Thirteen" pattern.

achievements.name: eagle_5
achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies within 10 seconds using the Buzzsaw 42 light machine gun. Unlocks the "Old Blood and Guts" mask, "Light Barrel" for the Buzzsaw 42 light machine gun, "Patriot" material and "Captain War" pattern.

achievements.name: deer_1
achievements.description: Complete the White Xmas job on the Normal difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Mrs. Claus" mask.

achievements.name: deer_2
achievements.description: Complete the White Xmas job on the Hard difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Strinch" mask.

achievements.name: deer_3
achievements.description: Complete the White Xmas job on the Very Hard difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Krampus" mask.

achievements.name: deer_4
achievements.description: Complete the White Xmas job on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Mechanical Santa" mask.

achievements.name: deer_5
achievements.displayName: Like Turkeys Voting for an Early Christmas
achievements.description: Complete the White Xmas job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: deer_6
achievements.description: In the White Xmas job, complete the heist on the Death Wish difficulty or above while each crew member wears a different "2014 Xmas" mask each. Unlocks the "Almir's Beard" mask.

achievements.name: deer_7
achievements.displayName: Impossible, It Can't Be. Is It?
achievements.description: In the White Xmas job, secure the rare Almir's Toast.

achievements.name: bat_1
achievements.description: Complete The Diamond job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: bat_2
achievements.description: In The Diamond job, complete the heist without triggering the alarm. Unlocks "The Cursed One" mask, "Sand" material and "Hieroglyphs" pattern.

achievements.name: bat_3
achievements.description: In The Diamond job, secure 10 bags of additional loot. Unlocks the "Medusa" mask, "Rusting Metal" material and "Runes" pattern.

achievements.name: bat_4
achievements.description: In The Diamond job, steal the Diamond and escape in under 10 minutes. Unlocks the "Pazuzu" mask, "Diamond" material and "Horus" pattern.

achievements.name: bat_5
achievements.description: In The Diamond job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different "Diamond Heist" mask each on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

achievements.name: bat_6
achievements.description: In The Diamond job, complete the heist, diamond puzzle and steal the Diamond after the alarm has been triggered on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Anubis" mask, "Mummy Bandages" material and "Hawk Helm" pattern.

achievements.name: frog_1
achievements.description: In the Hoxton Breakout job, complete the heist on the OVERKILL difficulty or above with each crew member using no skills, wearing suits, wielding Golden AK.762 rifles and Chicago Typewriter submachine guns. Unlocks a new skill slot.

achievements.name: gorilla_1
achievements.description: Knock out a Bulldozer using the OVERKILL boxing gloves. Unlocks "The Champ" mask.

achievements.name: cow_1
achievements.description: Complete The Bomb: Forest job on the Normal difficulty or above.

achievements.name: cow_2
achievements.description: Complete The Bomb: Forest job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: cow_3
achievements.description: In The Bomb: Forest job, cut down all trees within 5 seconds. Unlocks the "Butcher From Hell" mask, "Meat" material and "Pleter" pattern.

achievements.name: cow_4
achievements.description: In The Bomb: Forest job, do not let the cops disconnect the water hose while you are using the river water pump. Unlocks the "Tech Lion" mask, "Marble Rock" material and "Lion Game Lion" pattern.

achievements.name: cow_5
achievements.description: Complete The Bomb: Forest job without letting any civilian flee or die, having at least five civilians in the heist, while escaping with the boat. Unlocks "The Doctor" mask, "Plywood" material and "Caduceus" pattern.

achievements.name: cow_6
achievements.description: Complete The Bomb: Dockyard job on the Normal difficulty or above.

achievements.name: cow_7
achievements.description: Complete The Bomb: Dockyard job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: cow_8
achievements.description: Complete The Bomb: Dockyard job in stealth on the Death Wish difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Lady Butcher" mask, "Rhino" material and "Checker Board" pattern.

achievements.name: cow_9
achievements.description: In The Bomb: Dockyard job, find the meth lab. Unlocks the "Extended Mag" for the LEO pistol.

achievements.name: cow_10

achievements.name: cow_11
achievements.description: In The Bomb: Dockyard job, open the dock gate in 60 seconds using the keycards. Unlocks the "Custom Slide" for the LEO pistol.

achievements.name: ameno_1
achievements.description: In the Nightclub job, complete the heist on any difficulty with each crew member using the OVE 9000 saw as primary and secondary weapons. Unlocks the "THRUST Upper Receiver", "THRUST Lower Receiver" and "Long Ergo Foregrip" for the CAR weapon family.

achievements.name: ameno_2
achievements.description: In the Nightclub job, have 12 hostages or more on the dance floor when you escape. Unlocks the "Aluminum Grip" for the AK weapon family, the "Aluminum Foregrip" for the Krinkov submachine gun and the "LW Upper Receiver" for the CAR weapon family.

achievements.name: ameno_3
achievements.description: In the Mallcrasher job, loot $1,800,000 in loose cash within 50 seconds of starting the heist. The heist must be played on the OVERKILL difficulty. Unlocks the "Scope Mount" and "PBS Suppressor" for the AK weapon family, "Alfred" mask, "Dawn" material and "Dinosaur Skull" pattern.

achievements.name: ameno_4
achievements.description: In the Firestarter job, complete the heist on the OVERKILL difficulty or above, with all days done in loud and with a crew of 4 players using unmodified "AK Rifle" rifles and "PARA" submachine guns. Unlocks the "DMR Kit AK.762" and the "Low Drag Magazine" for the AK weapon family, "Timothy" mask, "Prehistoric" material and "Dinosaur Stripes" pattern.

achievements.name: ameno_5
achievements.displayName: The Wolf Lures You to Your Grave
achievements.description: In the Art Gallery job, kill two of the patrolling guards in stealth in the bathroom. Unlocks the "E.M.O. Foregrip" and the "OVAL Foregrip" for the CAR weapon family and the "Aftermarket Shorty" for the PARA submachine gun.

achievements.name: ameno_6
achievements.description: In the Art Gallery job, complete the heist in stealth within 4 minutes with each crew member wearing the Improved Combined Tactical Vest and no Armor Bag deployable equipped. Unlocks the "Classic Stock" for the AK weapon family, "2 Piece Stock" for the AK and CAR weapon families, "Pachy" mask, "Fossil" material and "Prehistoric Predator" pattern.

achievements.name: ameno_7
achievements.description: In the Jewelry store job, don't let the cops enter the jewelry store until the van comes back on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "DMR Kit AMR-16" and the "L5 Magazine" for the CAR weapon family, "Vincent" mask, "Feathers" material and "Dinosaur Scars" pattern.

achievements.name: ameno_8
achievements.description: Kill 100 cops using only weapons from the AK or CAR weapon families. Unlocks the "Keymod Rail", the "Crabs Rail" and the "Modern Barrel" for the AK weapon family.

achievements.name: ovk_1
achievements.description: Complete the Rats job with you and your four man crew having Combined Tactical Vests, Vulcan Miniguns, HRL-7 Rocket Launchers and "General OVERKILL" masks equipped on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

achievements.name: ovk_2
achievements.displayName: I Have No Idea What I'm Doing
achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, complete the heist in stealth while having the Vulcan Minigun and HRL-7 Rocket Launcher equipped.

achievements.name: ovk_3
achievements.displayName: Oh, That's How You Do It
achievements.description: Fire the Vulcan Minigun for 25 seconds without reloading or letting go of the trigger.

achievements.name: ovk_4
achievements.displayName: We Are Rockstars On This Job
achievements.description: Complete the Watchdogs job with each crew member using no skills, wielding the AMCAR Rifle and Chimano 88 Pistol on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

achievements.name: ovk_5
achievements.description: In the Breaking Ballot heist of the Election Day job, complete the heist with you and your four man crew without letting anyone getting downed, cloaked or cuffed on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: ovk_6
achievements.description: In the Big Oil job, complete day 1 in stealth on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

achievements.name: ovk_7
achievements.description: Kill 120 or more enemies in any day in a heist, with you and your four man crew having at least 120% crew accuracy at the end of the heist.

achievements.name: ovk_8
achievements.description: Complete the Big Oil job, with at least one other player, all using suits and Akimbo Bernetti 9 Pistols on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

achievements.name: ovk_9
achievements.displayName: Bring Your Cop To Work Day
achievements.description: On any day of a heist, have four law enforcers converted at the same time on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

achievements.name: ovk_10
achievements.description: On day 1 of the Firestarter job, complete heist having burned all weapons on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: slakt_1
achievements.description: On day 1 of the Election Day job, tag the right truck and leave within a minute of the start of the heist.

achievements.name: slakt_2
achievements.description: Answer 4 pagers by yourself within 90 seconds from the first to the last pager.

achievements.name: slakt_3
achievements.description: In the Hoxton Breakout job, complete day 2 without using a single keycard on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

achievements.name: slakt_4
achievements.description: In the Nightclub job, zip-tie the DJ and bring him to the escape zone by the escape van.

achievements.name: slakt_5
achievements.description: In the Firestarter job, complete day 3 with you and your crew staying inside the vault while all of the money burns out on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: djur_1
achievements.description: Complete the Cook Off job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: fort_3
achievements.description: In the Car Shop job, be the first player in a four-man crew to reach the docks.

achievements.name: payback_1
achievements.description: Complete the Hoxton Revenge job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: payback_2
achievements.description: Complete the Hoxton Revenge job without triggering the alarm.

achievements.name: fort_4
achievements.description: In the Car Shop job, complete the heist within 4 minutes. Unlocks "The Tids" mask.

achievements.name: payback_3
achievements.description: Kill the traitor. Unlocks "The Hard Hat" mask.

achievements.name: fort_1
achievements.description: Complete the Car Shop job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: fort_2
achievements.description: Enter a drivable vehicle.

achievements.name: grill_1
achievements.description: Have 10 enemies burning simultaneously. Unlocks the "Graug" mask, "Coal" material and "Fireborn" pattern.

achievements.name: grill_2

achievements.description: Set an enemy on fire and kill him with the "Motherforker" melee weapon. Unlocks "The Gas Mask" mask, "Candlelight" material and "Flammable" pattern.

achievements.name: grill_3
achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies within 10 seconds using the Piglet Grenade Launcher without using Incendiary rounds. Unlocks the "Firefighter's Helmet" mask, "Burn" material and "Flamer" pattern.

achievements.name: grill_4
achievements.description: Set a Bulldozer on fire for at least 10 seconds. Unlocks "The Chef" mask, "Toast" material and "Hot Flames" pattern.

achievements.name: scorpion_1
achievements.description: Pick up 100 arrows. Unlocks the "Desert Skull" mask, "Western Sunset" material and "Mystical" pattern.

achievements.name: scorpion_2
achievements.description: Kill 3 enemies at the same time with the Dynamite. Unlocks the "Wild West Classic" mask, "Cactus" material and "Coyote" pattern.

achievements.name: scorpion_3
achievements.description: Get 10 or more arrows stuck in a Bulldozer at the same time. Unlocks the "Lone Heister" mask, "Scorpion" material and "Totem" pattern.

achievements.name: melt_4

achievements.name: live_2

achievements.name: live_3

achievements.name: live_4
achievements.description: In The Alesso Heist, complete the heist in loud without using the zip-line or bag chutes on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Female Concert Goer" mask, "Stained Glass" material and "Soundwave" pattern.

achievements.name: live_5
achievements.description: In The Alesso Heist, complete the pyrosequences without failing even once. Unlocks the "Male Concert Goer" mask, "Dim Blue" material and "Smoke" pattern.

achievements.name: kenaz_1
achievements.displayName: How the Fuck Can You Grin?
achievements.description: Complete the Golden Grin Casino job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: kenaz_2
achievements.description: Complete the Golden Grin Casino job in stealth. Unlocks the "Wheeler Dealer" mask, "Stars" material and "Chips" pattern.

achievements.name: kenaz_3
achievements.displayName: City of Sin and Well-Oiled Gears
achievements.description: Complete the Golden Grin Casino job without having the Big Fucking Drill ever break in loud. Unlocks the "Murmillo Galea Helmet" mask, "Casino" material and "Royale" pattern.

achievements.name: kenaz_4
achievements.description: Complete the Golden Grin Casino job under 14 minutes. Unlocks "The King" mask, "Plush" material and "Cards" pattern.

achievements.name: kenaz_5
achievements.description: In the Golden Grin Casino job, kill "The King" and complete the heist in stealth. Unlocks the "Sports Utility Mask" mask, "Carpet" material and "Dices" pattern.

achievements.name: turtles_1

achievements.description: Get eleven kills with the Lebensauger .308 Sniper Rifle without reloading it. Unlocks the "Slicer" mask, "Still Waters" material and "Youkai" pattern.

achievements.name: turtles_2

achievements.name: turtles_4

achievements.name: steel_1

achievements.name: steel_2
achievements.displayName: Their Armor Is Thick and Their Shields Broad
achievements.description: Kill 10 shields with a Gage Chivalry Pack melee weapon in a single heist. Unlocks the "Agatha Vanguard Veteran" mask, "Chain Armor" material and "Medieval" pattern.

achievements.name: steel_3
achievements.description: Kill a Cloaker with the Javelin throwable. Unlocks the "Mason Knight Veteran" mask, "Scale Armor" material and "Mason" pattern.

achievements.name: steel_4
achievements.description: Kill a black Bulldozer with the Great Sword melee weapon. Unlocks the "Mason Vanguard Veteran" mask, "Forged" material and "Checkered Out" pattern.

achievements.name: death_25
achievements.description: Complete the Transport: Train Heist on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: sinus_1
achievements.description: I may be homeless, but at least I have a sick knife.

achievements.name: sinus_2
achievements.description: Complete the Aftershock job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: green_1

achievements.name: green_2

achievements.name: green_3
achievements.description: Complete the First World Bank job in stealth under 13 minutes and 37 seconds.

achievements.name: green_4
achievements.description: Complete the First World Bank job on the OVERKILL difficulty or above by securing all additional money bags while not using the loot vent bag shortcut for the additional money bags.

achievements.name: green_5
achievements.description: Complete the First World Bank job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: green_6
achievements.description: In the First World Bank job, solve the PAYDAY: The Heist secret on the Death Wish difficulty or above and enter the OVERVAULT.

achievements.name: green_7
achievements.description: In the First World Bank job, find the Titan safe and collect the special item inside.

achievements.name: farm_1

achievements.name: farm_2
achievements.description: In the Slaughterhouse job, get the armored truck to drop without shooting at the wires on which it is suspended.

achievements.name: farm_3
achievements.description: Complete the Slaughterhouse job on the OVERKILL difficulty or above without anyone killing a single sniper.

achievements.name: farm_4
achievements.description: In the Slaughterhouse job, pick up two gasoline tanks within 30 seconds of entering the slaughterhouse.

achievements.name: farm_5
achievements.description: Complete the Slaughterhouse job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: farm_6
achievements.description: In the Slaughterhouse job, find the marked pig, secure it in the container and then complete the heist on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

achievements.description: Jump. Unlocks the "Funnyman" mask.

achievements.name: brooklyn_2

achievements.name: brooklyn_4
achievements.description: Complete a heist without it ever going more than 4 seconds between you jumping. Unlocks the "Dawg" mask.

achievements.name: berry_3
achievements.description: In the Beneath the Mountain job, open the 4 vaults that contain loot within 10 minutes of starting the heist on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

achievements.name: berry_4
achievements.description: Complete the Beneath the Mountain job on the OVERKILL difficulty or above without any player going down.

achievements.name: berry_5

achievements.name: jerry_1
achievements.description: Complete the Birth of Sky job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: jerry_2
achievements.description: In the Birth of Sky job, parachute into the diner through a hole in the roof.

achievements.description: In the Birth of Sky job, release the money without having any player take health damage on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Oro" mask, "Glade" material and "Tribal Wave" pattern.

achievements.name: jerry_4
achievements.description: In the Birth of Sky job, have the entire crew jump out of the airplane within 1 minute and 23 seconds on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Maui" mask, "Wade" material and "Ornamental Crown" pattern.

achievements.name: jerry_5
achievements.description: Complete the Birth of Sky job, have the entire crew use only pistols and Two Piece Suits on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

achievements.name: cane_2
achievements.description: In the Santa's Workshop job, keep all the elves alive for 30 minutes after the first assault starts on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

achievements.name: cane_3
achievements.description: Complete the Santa's Workshop job after having secured at least 100 bags in the chimney on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Rudelf" mask.

achievements.name: cane_4
achievements.description: Complete the Santa's Workshop job having all players in the crew only use shotguns. Unlocks the "Christmas Cap" mask.

achievements.name: cane_5
achievements.description: In the Santa's Workshop job, secure 10 bags of loot without using any player equipment or assets.

achievements.name: flake_1

achievements.name: peta_1

achievements.name: peta_2

achievements.name: peta_3

achievements.name: peta_5
achievements.description: In day 2 of the Goat Simulator job, send all goats in separate cages on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Slick Goat" mask, "Tongue" material and "Fur" pattern.

achievements.name: pal_3

achievements.name: pal_4

achievements.name: pal_5
achievements.description: On the Counterfeit job, have all civilians as hostages until the safe is opened.

achievements.name: man_3

achievements.name: man_4

achievements.name: man_5
achievements.description: Complete the Undercover job on the OVERKILL difficulty or above, using only a grenade launcher or rocket launcher.

achievements.name: dark_1
achievements.description: Complete the Murky Station job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.name: dark_2
achievements.description: Complete the Murky Station job within 7 minutes of starting it. Unlocks the "Cloaker-san" mask, "Rusty" material and "Rebel" pattern.

achievements.name: dark_3
achievements.description: Complete the Murky Station job without anyone in the crew killing anyone. Unlocks the "Augmentation" mask, "Spaceship" material and "Squares" pattern.

achievements.name: dark_4

achievements.name: dark_5
achievements.description: Complete the Murky Station job after hiding one body bag in each dumpster.

achievements.name: mad_1

achievements.name: voff_2

achievements.name: voff_3

achievements.name: voff_4
achievements.description: In the Birth of Sky job, find all 9 rings.

achievements.name: voff_5
achievements.description: In the Cook Off job, cook 25 bags of meth on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

achievements.name: born_1

achievements.name: born_3
achievements.description: In the first day of The Biker Heist, let Mike the mechanic complete the bike without any interruptions on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks "The Classic" mask, "Hotrod" material and "Engine" pattern.

achievements.name: born_4

achievements.name: born_5

achievements.name: born_6
